name: achiev-html-generator
description: Generates achievements.html page based on a list of events

scripts.prettify: echo 'ðŸ’…  Prettifying new file'; prettier --write achievements_new.html --loglevel silent
scripts.replace: echo 'ðŸ’¥  Replacing old file with the new'; cp -fr achievements_new.html ../../achievements.html
scripts.all: npm run generate && npm run -s prettify && npm run -s replace
